title: Savior

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target would die at night, you will instantly revive them. You will also learn their role.
- The town will not know they were revived, but the target and you will know.
- You cannot target the Town (Power).
- You cannot target someone you have already revived.

desc:
Post 423
"Why didn't I save you before you died? That's a bit above my pay grade don't you think?"
